about_the_game:
''Every nightmare can turn into a fairy tale!'' -Jack the Braveheart

"Babies vs Monsters" is a fast-paced bullet hell action rogue-lite game in 2D top-down cartoon style, where you help hero baby characters fight against their fears.

Gather your favorite toys, muster your courage, recruit new hero babies to your team, engage in various and challenging boss battles and clear the monsters from your dreams one by one.

FEATURES(For Early Access)

  • Over 80 toy options(items)
  • 3 Unique babies
  • More than 12 normal and 4 elite monsters with various challenging mechanics
  • 15+ Special baby traits for customizing your gameplay style however you like (Defensive, Offensive or Functional etc.)
  • 20+ Advanced abilities exclusive to babies
  • 2 Different playground
  • 2 boss options with souls-like difficulty and very special attack patterns




Take your toys with you and fight the monsters with the unique abilities of babies!

Hints for some unique baby abilities:
*No Baby No Cry: Annoy the monsters with your endless tears!
*Diaper Disaster: Send them to a stinky hell!
*Mama's Slipper: A slippery spank but for the monsters!




With hero babies possessing unique abilities and personalities, you can experience a different nightmare each time, switch between defensive, offensive, or functional gameplay styles, and try out different builds!

  • Jack the Braveheart: Fearless(kinda) leader of the baby crew. For aggressive but safe playstyle lovers.
  • Eden the Eagle Eye: Candy lover sweet girl. Fragile yet deadly from afar
  • Noah the Wise: The team's bookworm smart child. Even himself doesn't know what he is capable of.




    The real nightmare is just beginning. You must battle against these evil bosses who want to trap you in their world! But be careful, these bosses are truly the kings of nightmares.

    Learn their unique attack and movement patterns to defeat them, and reclaim the candies and pacifiers they stole from you!




    In the world of babies, candies and the pacifiers are the currency.

    Collect them by defeating waves of nightmares, then trade with expert babies who will train your skills, teach you new spells or give you new toys to empower you in the dream-world!

name: Babies vs Monsters

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3210
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon R7 265
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Babies Vs Monsters is a bullet hell rogue-like game with RPG elements. Designed with cartoonish animations, this game offers various characters, level designs, and challenging boss battles that are both fun and difficult!
